author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: Amazon: 40% Off Select Britax Car Seats = B-Safe 35 Infant Car Seat Only $114 Shipped & More
text:
Need a new car seat? Today only, head on over to Amazon.com where you can save up to 40% off select Britax Car Seats including both infant car seats and convertible car seats.
Check out these deals I spotted… Britax B-SAFE 35 Infant Slate Strie Car Seat 
Only $114 shipped (regularly $209.99)
Britax Marathon G4.1 Convertible Car Seat – Domino 
Only $159 shipped (regularly $232)
Britax Boulevard G4.1 Convertible Car Seat – Slate Strie 
Only $199 shipped (regularly $300.97)
